turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order from the Starbucks on Narcoossee Road in Orlando, Florida. I would like cappuccino grande with 2% milk and sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. let me repeat that order to make sure i got it down correctly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said you want a grande cappuccino with 2% milk and sugar from starbucks on narcuzzi road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.40 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, the drink will be ready in 10 minutes for pick up. the receipt will be sent to your phone via text message soon.
